name: Ikkiuchi
overview: A head to head, martial arts, fighting game created by Thomas Koncina and published in Magic Disk 64 1995/06 and released the following month in the 3-in-One Kombi. Ikkiuchi is Japanese and means something like duel; a fair duel between ninja adepts in blue and red suits in the local order castle according to the scheme "Best Of Three". Ikkiuchi can be played either in pairs against each other or alone against the almighty computer. All fights are timed, and the same attacks and defenses are available to each player to ensure fairness and equilibrium. However, players have to find out two specials for themselves. . .
